name: 30 seconds (UFO Products)
description:
Game where you have 30 seconds to get the key and exit the door! Can you do it?

More info:

There are 4 levels and 30 seconds for each level! Goal: take the key and exit the door Move - horizontal arrows Jump - "space"

Errors:

First you will appear on the first level ( press "Escape" to exit to the menu)
